Kardia by AliveCor

Brief: Kardia is an esteemed mobile application that works in concert with the KardiaMobile, KardiaMobile 6L, or KardiaBand hardware devices to empower individuals with the capability to capture incredibly accurate electrocardiogram (EKG) recordings. The app, coupled with its corresponding hardware, is celebrated by top cardiologists and boasts a global user base. Kardia serves as a bridge between patients and healthcare professionals, providing a reliable platform for monitoring cardiac health with a level of medical precision that commands the confidence of physicians.
